House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05135
FULL TITLE : AN ACT IMPOSING STIFFER PENALTIES FOR PERSONS FLEEING FROM ACCIDENT SCENES AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Anti - Hit - And - Run - Act
ABSTRACT : Seeks to put a stop to the nefarious practice of some motorists fleeing the scene of the accident after having hit pedestrians to escape responsibility and prosecution; Penalizes a driver of any kind of motor vehicle found to have committed such act.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2017-02-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
